sentences.sContent: Remember to divert your phone when you are out of the office.
sentences.sCn: 你不在办公室的时候要记得设定电话转移。

phrases.pCn: 把注意力从…转移开来；分散注意力

words.tran: 使转移；使得到消遣（divert的现在分词）

trans.tranCn: 转移， 转向； 使娱乐
trans.tranOther: if you divert your telephone calls, you arrange for them to go directly to another number, for example because you are not able to answer them yourself for some time
